prompt_conds:
// constraint: let Some(additional) = new_len.checked_sub(self.len()) is true
// constraint: additional == 0 is false
fn_tests.input_infer: 0 <= new_len < usize::MAX, 0 <= self.len() < new_len, value in 0..=255

prompt_conds:
// constraint: let Some(additional) = new_len.checked_sub(self.len()) is true
// constraint: additional == 0 is true
fn_tests.input_infer: new_len: 0 to usize::MAX, self.len(): 0 to usize::MAX (ensures additional is non-negative) and additional: 0 (triggers the condition where additional bytes are not needed)
